Hi  I'm new. May I ask what's the key difference between LLM and Grab Express? Is my understanding correct that LLM works based on scheduled orders vs Grab's assigned jobs?
LLM fastest finger winGrab based on sky drop and some prayer.
Lalamove is you can choose whatever jobs you want and some you need fast fingers.. grab express is wait and pray.. but their fare on grab express is just pathetic
